title: The Sean Graham Bookmakers' Shooting: Episode 260 (Part 2/2)
description:
Last week I covered the Teebane Bombing, a dreadful attack that saw 8 men murdered. In the episode this week, I look at the revenge attack by the UDA, which also destroyed so many lives and families.

1,  Please buy my book 'Gone Fishing' about the life and crimes of Angus Sinclair.
  • Gone Fishing: The Unsolved Crimes of Angus Sinclair: Amazon.co.uk: Chris Clark, Adam Lloyd: 9781914277221: Books
